## Example plot

Reference to a plot Figure \ref{fig:plot}.

\lipsum[1-1]

```{r, plot, fig.cap = "Example plot showing default ggplot2 theme"}
data(mpg, package = "ggplot2")

# Scatterplot
g <- ggplot(mpg, aes(cty, hwy))
g + geom_jitter(width = .5, size = 1) +
  labs(
    y = "Something",
    x = " Something else"
  )
```
